io.spine.code.proto

Class ColumnOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.code.proto.AbstractOption<F,com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.FieldDescriptor,com.google.protobuf.DescriptorProtos.FieldOptions>
      • io.spine.code.proto.FieldOption<java.lang.Boolean>
        • io.spine.code.proto.ColumnOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Option<java.lang.Boolean,com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.FieldDescriptor>

    public final class ColumnOption
extends FieldOption<java.lang.Boolean>
    An option which marks entity state fields as entity columns.

    Such fields are stored separately from the entity record and can be specified as criteria for the entity query filters.

    See the Protobuf option for details.

    • Method Detail

      • hasColumns

        public static boolean hasColumns(MessageType messageType)
        Returns true if the specified message type has at least one declared column.

        If the message type is not eligible for having columns, returns false regardless of how fields are declared.

      • columnsOf

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<FieldDeclaration> columnsOf(MessageType messageType)
        Returns all fields of a message type that are declared as columns.

        If the message type is not eligible for having columns, returns empty list regardless of how fields are declared.

      • isColumn

        public static boolean isColumn(FieldDeclaration field)
        Returns true if the specified field is an entity column.

        If the declaring message type is not eligible for having columns, returns false regardless of how the field is declared.

        The repeated and map fields cannot be columns.
